Articles.Content:
Hello, just bought this game, and I got to say I\'m addicted

Anyways, I\'m wondering what are the good mods out there?

I\'ve been trying ZOxygen but there seems to be few other mods out there that works properly with it (solar panel wise)

Anyone have a good combination og plugins and mods for me?

Welcome to the community!

Also, my favorite mods are the NovaPunch Remix Pack for more power, the MechJeb for getting to places you can\'t, and Kosmos for lots of Space Station parts.

Hope this helps!

Plaatinum_Spark
Thanks! I got those, I seem to have problem with that most Command modules stands that they can have 3 crew, but they spawn with 0 though..

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
